# error

**Instance Property**

The underlying error present when the column is invalid.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Handling data column errors

- **isValid**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the column is valid.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the column is valid.
items.name: isValid
